articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Russian-led air strikes suspended in Idlib after ceasefire: residents
articles.description: Russia and its allies halted air strikes in Syria's Idlib region on Sunday as a ceasefire agreed with Turkey came into force, residents, rebels and respondents said, although few were optimistic the truce would hold.
articles.content:
AMMAN (Reuters) - Russia and its allies halted air strikes in Syria’s Idlib region on Sunday as a ceasefire agreed with Turkey came into force, residents, rebels and respondents said, although few were optimistic the truce would hold.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: ATP makes $500,000 donation for Australian bushfire relief
articles.description: The ATP will donate $500,000 to the WWF Australian Wildlife and Nature Recovery Fund as part of the bushfire relief efforts, the governing body of men's tennis said on Sunday.
articles.content:
(Reuters) - The ATP will donate $500,000 to the WWF Australian Wildlife and Nature Recovery Fund as part of the bushfire relief efforts, the governing body of men’s tennis said on Sunday. 
The donation from players was announced by Novak Djokovic and Rafa Na… [+1373 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Iran's Khamenei calls for better regional cooperation, criticises U.S.
articles.description: Iran's Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, called on Sunday for increased cooperation among countries in the region to deal with problems he blamed on the United States, his official website said.
articles.content:
DUBAI (Reuters) - Iran’s Supreme Leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, called on Sunday for increased cooperation among countries in the region to deal with problems he blamed on the United States, his official website said.

articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: '1917' Defeats 'Star Wars' With $36.5 Million Weekend
articles.description: LOS ANGELES, (Variety.com) - Sam Mendes' "1917" marched to box office victory, earning a solid $36.5 million from 3,434 theaters in its first weekend of wide release.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES, (Variety.com) - Sam Mendes’ “1917” marched to box office victory, earning a solid $36.5 million from 3,434 theaters in its first weekend of wide release. 
Universal and DreamWorks’ World War I drama also defeated Disney’s “Star Wars: Rise of Sky… [+2759 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Mortar bombs strike Iraqi military base of Balad, four wounded - military sources
articles.description: Seven mortar bombs fell on Sunday inside Iraq's Balad air base, which houses U.S. forces, and four Iraqi soldiers were wounded in the attack, two military sources told Reuters.
articles.content:
TIKRIT, Iraq (Reuters) - Seven mortar bombs fell on Sunday inside Iraq’s Balad air base, which houses U.S. forces, and four Iraqi soldiers were wounded in the attack, two military sources told Reuters.

articles.author: Tim Reid
articles.title: Buttigieg gets endorsement from Iowa congressman ahead of February 3 caucus
articles.description: Democratic presidential candidate Pete Buttigieg was endorsed by veteran Iowa Congressman Dave Loebsack on Sunday, a high-profile boost for the White House hopeful just three weeks before the party's nominating contest begins in Iowa on Feb. 3.
